requirementsClass.name: Transmitter, Temperature, Electric
requirementsClass.description: A temperature transmitter that is generating a standardized electrical output signal representing the received input signal from the temperature sensor.

data.description: Part of the SmartLine® family of products, the STG700 and STG70L are suitable for monitoring, control, and data acquisition featuring piezoresistive sensor technology combining pressure sensing with on-chip temperature compensation capabilities providing high accuracy, stability, and performance over a wide range of application pressures and temperatures. The SmartLine family is also fully tested and compliant with Experion® PKS, providing the highest level of compatibility assurance and integration capabilities. SmartLine easily meets the most demanding application needs for pressure measurement applications.

propertyRequirement.name: Approximate operating weight
propertyRequirement.description: An objects approximate calculated operational weight without process fluid.

propertyRequirement.name: Accuracy range
propertyRequirement.description: The closeness of agreement between the result of a measurement and the conventionally true value of the quantity being measured.

propertyRequirement.name: Communication standard
propertyRequirement.description: A standard protocol for communication with another device.

propertyRequirement.name: Output signal
propertyRequirement.description: A standardised signal representing the measured value from the process.

propertyRequirement.name: Zero adjustment
propertyRequirement.description: Assign if the instrument can be zero adjusted.

propertyRequirement.name: Ambient temperature
propertyRequirement.description: The temperature which is the lowest and highest ambient temperature under which a functional and physical object is supposed to operate.

propertyRequirement.name: EX certificate number
propertyRequirement.description: The examination certificate number for the physical object issued by a notified body.

standardsReferencesData.name: CFIHOS
standardsReferencesData.propertyRequirementId: CFIHOS-40000109  explosion protection examination certificate number

propertyRequirement.name: Hazardous area
propertyRequirement.description: Confirm whether the device does or does not meet the demands regarding Hazardous Area regulations.

propertyRequirement.name: Temperature class
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the temperature classification of the physical object in accordance to a known standard.

propertyRequirement.name: Approval authority
propertyRequirement.description: The name of the nationally accredited approval body that has issued the examination certificate for the physical object.

propertyRequirement.name: ATEX category
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies in which category the physical object is divided in accordance with the directive 94/9/EC.

propertyRequirement.name: ATEX explosive atmosphere
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies in which explosive atmosphere the physical object is divided in accordance with the directive 94/9/EC.

propertyRequirement.name: ATEX group
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies in which group the physical object is divided in accordance with the directive 94/9/EC.

propertyRequirement.name: CE marking
propertyRequirement.description: Identification number of the hazardous area notifying body responsible for the approval.

propertyRequirement.name: Equipment protection level
propertyRequirement.description: (EPL) Specifies the protection level of electrical equipment's explosion protection in accordance to EN 60079-0.

propertyRequirement.name: Explosion protection
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the identification of electrical equipment's explosion protection and type of ignition protection in accordance to a known standard.

propertyRequirement.name: IP-Class
propertyRequirement.description: A code for an electrical apparatus degree of protection against the intrusion of solid objects, dust, accidental contact, water intrusion or mechanical impact to a known standard.

propertyRequirement.name: Gas-group
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the gas group classification of the physical object in accordance to a known standard.

propertyRequirement.name: Power consumption
propertyRequirement.description: The power which is the lowest and highest power consumption a functional or physical object is supposed to consume.

propertyRequirement.name: Supply voltage range
propertyRequirement.description: The rated or nominal, lowest and highest voltage which can be supplied to an object.

propertyRequirement.name: Non process cover material
propertyRequirement.description: The material of construction for the structural part of a functional or physical object which is not in contact with the process.

propertyRequirement.name: Process connection design
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the design of the physical objects connection to the process.

propertyRequirement.name: Process connection size
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the size of the physical objects connection to the process.

propertyRequirement.name: Supply connection design
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the design of the physical objects connection to the electrical or fluidic control supply source.

propertyRequirement.name: Supply connection size
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the size of the physical objects connection to the electrical or fluidic control supply source.

propertyRequirement.name: Thread pitch, process connection
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the number of threads pr. inch referred to in the imperial system or how many mm between each thread in the ISO metric system for the process connection design.

propertyRequirement.name: Thread pitch, supply connection
propertyRequirement.description: Specifies the number of threads per inch referred to the imperial system or how many mm between each thread in the ISO metric system for the electrical or fluidic control supply connection design.

propertyRequirement.name: Element arrangement
propertyRequirement.description: Assign if the measuring element is remote or local mounted.

propertyRequirement.name: Indicator
propertyRequirement.description: Assign if an indicator is included.

documentCategory.name: Installation, operation and maintenance instructions
documentCategory.description: The manufacturer's standard IOM should be used as far as possible.This document shall provide sufficient information to install, operate and maintain the equipment.This document shall also provide sufficient information for troubleshooting.

data.documentTitle: STT700 Series HART/DE Option User’s Manual

requirementsCategories.name: Installation, operation and maintenance instructions
requirementsCategories.description: The manufacturer's standard IOM should be used as far as possible.This document shall provide sufficient information to install, operate and maintain the equipment.This document shall also provide sufficient information for troubleshooting.

requirementsCategories.name: Detail cross sectional drawings with parts list
requirementsCategories.description: A view or drawing that shows what the inside of equipment looks like after a cross-sectional cut has been made.The manufacturer's standard detail cross sectional drawing shall be delivered.Typical information may be:• Items list with reference to supplier’s part number.• Material definition with reference to relevant standards

requirementsCategories.name: Packing, storage, preservation, lifting, transportation and handling procedure
requirementsCategories.description: A compound document that may contain: • Packing lists• Instructions for transport• Handling• Lifting• Storage location and requirements• Preservation of the equipment during short- and long term storage• Maintenance intervals• Inspection intervals• Instructions for unpacking if applicable• Completed applicable forms for mechanical completion• Certificate of conformity, data sheets• Preservation log• Certificate for lifting equipment• Material certificates

requirementsCategories.name: Termination and wiring diagram
requirementsCategories.description: Document to identify terminals for external connection, including marking (if applicable) and signal/power description. Cable entry information may be included in this drawing or part of valve drawing. The supplier standard drawing to be delivered if existing.

requirementsCategories.name: General Arrangement drawing
requirementsCategories.description: The manufacturer's standard general arrangement should be used as far as possible.A drawing showing overall dimensions, critical interface dimensions, part references and weight of assemblies, equipment and components. The drawing shallcontain reference to main specifications and standards For equipment / components the drawing may include cross sectional views.Document may contain the following information:• Main dimensions• Interface connections• Weight• Centre of gravity• Withdrawal/installation and maintenance space.• Installation and mounting details• Lifting arrangement

documentCategory.name: Spare part list
documentCategory.description: Mandatory content of information:- Item reference number- Quantity- Part number or global identifier (together with manufacturer / supplier)- Part name.Optional content of information:- Type designation- Specifying technical data- Descriptive technical data- Mass, dimensions- Reference to document- Remark.

documentRequirement.requirementCondition: {geicl:notderivable}When supplier consider spare parts to be applicable. If replaced by complete unit this document is not required.

documentCategory.name: EU declaration of conformity
documentCategory.description: The EU Declaration of conformity shall be written up by the manufacturer of the equipment or component, as the legal binding document from the manufacturer to the purchaser / user ensuring conformity with the relevant EU directive(s). EU declaration of Conformity shall be delivered according to requirements of the relevant EU - directives with respect to conformity assessment procedures and eventual necessary involvements of Notified Bodies. Certificate(s) of conformance, required by relevant directive(s), shall be available.

requirementsCategories.name: EU declaration of conformity
requirementsCategories.description: The EU Declaration of conformity shall be written up by the manufacturer of the equipment or component, as the legal binding document from the manufacturer to the purchaser / user ensuring conformity with the relevant EU directive(s). EU declaration of Conformity shall be delivered according to requirements of the relevant EU - directives with respect to conformity assessment procedures and eventual necessary involvements of Notified Bodies. Certificate(s) of conformance, required by relevant directive(s), shall be available.

documentCategory.name: EX certificate
documentCategory.description: The equipment’s explosion protection certificate shall be delivered according to recognized standards.This certificate proves that equipment conforms to the specific standard for the type of explosion protection, e.g. ATEX, IECThis document shall provide input to IS-calculations, special requirements for safe use, barrier/isolator to be used, etc.

documentRequirement.requirementCondition: {geicl:notderivable}To be provided if ordered as EX certified
documentRequirement.reqDetails: Always to be delivered If equipment is certified for use in hazardous area

requirementsCategories.name: EX certificate
requirementsCategories.description: The equipment’s explosion protection certificate shall be delivered according to recognized standards.This certificate proves that equipment conforms to the specific standard for the type of explosion protection, e.g. ATEX, IECThis document shall provide input to IS-calculations, special requirements for safe use, barrier/isolator to be used, etc.

documentCategory.name: Data sheet
documentCategory.description: This document provides structured data form containing part number/model, design information,operational data and limitations of the equipment. Document shall provide information on technical data and characteristics about material, products or systems and their environment for proper implementation.

documentRequirement.reqDetails: Standard product data sheet to be delivered. NORSOK datasheets may be used for product individual use.
